msg: Remove the beos network I/O code and merge it with the unix code.  Most

msg: Fix a typo in the new beos code in the unix dir.

author: trawick
msg: Handle some OS/390-isms dealing with pthreads:
. the types of the parameters to pthread_attr_setdetachstate()
. the fact that sigprocmask() must be use to set a thread's

author: rbb
msg: Update the unix code to support BeOS.  Remove the now un-necessary BeOS

author: rbb
msg: Remove the separate beos directory and add support to the unix directory
for BeOS support.  The diffs are minimal, and this makes it much easier
to find and fix bugs, without duplicating nearly as much code.
